text: Swami Swaroopanand Saraswati (2 September 1924 â€“ 11 September 2022) was an Indian religious leader. In 1982, he became the Shankaracharya of Dwarka Sharada Peetham in Badrinath. Saraswati was born in Seoni, then-British India. Saraswati died on 11 September 2022 in Narsinghpur, India from a heart attack, nine days after his 98th birthday. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian religious leaders
title: Swaroopanand Saraswati
